task.question: What river was a border with the Ammonites (Deut. 3:16)?
The western tribal border for Reuben and Gad followed the Jordan River from ___________ to the Salt Sea (Deut. 3:17)
One of the requirements of the city of refuge was that they were to be located __________ (Deut. 19:2)?
What two kings came out to fight against Israel before they crossed the Jordan river (Deut. 29:7)?

choices.choice: Og king of Bashan and Balak king of Moab
Abimelech king of Philistia and Phicol king of Amalek
Og king of Bashan and Sihon king of Heshbon
Abimelech king of Philistia and Balak king of Moab

task.answer: Og king of Bashan and Sihon king of Heshbon

task.question: The LORD told Moses that he was not allowed to cross (Deut. 31:2)
After the death of Moses, what was Joshua instructed to cross over (Josh. 1:2)
What did the spies have to cross to return to Joshua (Josh. 2:23)?
When did Joshua cross the Jordan river (Josh. 4:19)

choices.choice: First day of the first month
The fifteenth day of the seventh month
The tenth day of the first month
The last day of the seventh month

task.answer: The tenth day of the first month

task.question: The LORD dried up the Jordan River so that all the peoples of the earth might know (Josh. 4:24)

choices.choice: That the LORD keeps his promise
That the hand of the LORD is powerful
That God is an awesome God
That the LORD is a holy God

task.answer: That the hand of the LORD is powerful

task.question: The LORD dried up the Jordan River so that Israel might (Josh. 4:24)
